revision.text: <onlyinclude>*'''{{LE|WeaponPiece.Number}}''' ''number'' :The piece number. This can be a value between 1 and 32. To complete a weapon all available pieces as specified in the weapon must be picked up. *'''{{LE|WeaponPiece.Weapon}}''' ''weapontype'' :The weapon this item helps to assemble.</onlyinclude> [[Category:Editing references]]
